channel.title: Tree's Top 5 Tips To Improve Your Server
channel.description:
This week I thought I would do something a little different and provide 5 tips for improving the state of your private servers. Included are things to be mindful of when actually selecting a server to devote your time on. [b]Note: This is mainly audio so it works best if you just keep it running in another tab.[/b] Apologies for the slightly off editing and occasional train of throught derailment.
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NvitjlJUYmE&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

item.title: Tree's Top 5 Tips To Improve Your Server
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:3, topic:550780”][quote author=Welliton_inc link=topic=669689.msg4478068#msg4478068 date=1427470202]
Nice video but the underlining truth is that your server can be spectacular to the eye and be great to play, but if it is not stable then it is worthless
[/quote]

To be honest, I’d rather see just see a really polished server.
After that, then the custom content should be added and tested.[/quote]

For me having a polished server shows you’re treating your server the way it should, it’s always nice for a server to look good to the eye as it attracts players in the first place. But if someone came on the server and started to spawn max cash and objects and open up interfaces that shouldn’t be opened up then I would stop playing immediately. I personally think there is no point playing a server if it’s open to countless game-ruining exploits.

Read full topic
item.source: Tree's Top 5 Tips To Improve Your Server

item.title: Tree's Top 5 Tips To Improve Your Server
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Nice video but the underlining truth is that your server can be spectacular to the eye and be great to play, but if it is not stable then it is worthless

To be honest, I’d rather see just see a really polished server.
After that, then the custom content should be added and tested.

Read full topic
